clear_addressbar_description.message: The automatic emptying of the address bar or selecting the URL is currently not possible for WebExtensions. This requires a change by Mozilla.

default_option_description.message: To use Firefox's default page, please open about:addons and disable the New Tab Override extension (no uninstall required).

extension_description.message: New Tab Override brings back the ability to change the page which is shown when opening a new tab

focus_website_description.message: Set focus to the web page instead of the address bar

github_notice.message: Feature requests or error report? Open a ticket on GitHub:

homepage_description.message: If this option is enabled, Firefox will use the home page as the new tab page, too. You can change the home page by typing about:preferences#general in the address bar. Only home pages starting with http:// or https:// are supported. If multiple home pages are configured, New Tab Override will use the first one.

introduction_part_two.message: Select which page should open as new tab!

local_file_delete_confirmation.message: Are you sure you want to delete the file from the extension's storage?

local_file_description.message: Due to Firefox restrictions, it is not possible for extensions to access local files. New Tab Override provides you with the possibility to load local HTML files into the extension's storage and to use them as a new tab content. Any URLs and links to images, CSS files and JavaScript files that may be included must be accessible via the web because Firefox can not access local files on the system. Alternatively, please consider using a local web server, for example via MAMP or XAMPP, with the “custom URL” option. This works without any restriction.

local_file_no_file.message: You selected the “local file” option, but did not store a local file. Please store a file in the New Tab Override settings.

review_text.message: Do you like the extension? Then please leave a review on

settings_donation_text.message: Please consider a donation to support the ongoing development of this extension.

settings_feed_permission_description.message: Firefox needs your permission to read the news feed from soeren-hentzschel.at. You can revoke this permission at any time.

settings_feed_permission_needed.message: To use this feature you have to allow Firefox to access the data source.

settings_feed_permission_revoke_descript.message: Firefox needs your permission to read the news feed from soeren-hentzschel.at. You have already granted this permission.

settings_homepage_permission_description.message: Firefox needs your permission to read and to modify the browser settings. You can revoke this permission at any time.

settings_homepage_permission_needed.message: To use this feature you have to allow Firefox to read and to modify the browser settings.

settings_homepage_permission_revoke_desc.message: Firefox needs your permission to read and to modify the browser settings. You have already granted this permission.

type_options_default_new_tab.message: default new tab page of Firefox (about:newtab)

url_description.message: The web page entered here is displayed when opening a new tab. Only URLs starting with http:// or https:// are supported. Please note: Access to local files via URL is no longer possible due to Firefox restrictions. Please consider using the “local file” option or a local web server, for example via MAMP or XAMPP.

url_validation_default.message: This is not a valid URL.

url_validation_file.message: Access to local files via URL is no longer possible for extensions.
